00007 /* DOES NOT SUPPORT WAVEFORM MODE and does not include burst mode, clock invert or external clock configuration */

00016 #define TIMER_CHANNEL_2     2

00019 #define EX_TRG_RISING       1
00020 #define EX_TRG_FALLING      2
00021 #define EX_TRG_EACH         3
00022 
00023 #define EX_TRG_TIOB         0
00024 #define EX_TRG_TIOA         1
00025 
00026 #define RC_COMP_NONE        0
00027 #define RC_COMP_TRG         1

00029 #define LDRA_TIOA_NONE      0
00030 #define LDRA_TIOA_RISING    1    
00031 #define LDRA_TIOA_FALLING   2
00032 #define LDRA_TIOA_EACH      3
00033

00052 uint8_t
00053 timer_init (uint8_t channel);

00056 /* Selects and applies a suitable prescale for the clock, based on the given period */
00057 /* The period is in (master) clocks.                                                */
00058 uint8_t
00059 timer_prescaler_set (uint8_t channel, unsigned int period);

00063 /* Set the timer to run in capture mode */
00064 uint8_t
00065 timer_capture_mode_set (uint8_t channel);
00066 
00067 
00068 /*     Timer channel external trigger configuration (in capture mode only)      */
00069 /*                                                                              */
00070 /*                          --------OPTIONS--------                             */
00071 /* ex_trg_edge:     EX_TRG_NONE     - No external trigger                       */
00072 /*                  EX_TRG_RISING   - Trigger on signal rising edge             */ 
00073 /*                  EX_TRG_FALLING  - Trigger on signal falling edge            */
00074 /*                  EX_TRG_EACH     - Trigger on both rising and falling edges  */
00075 /* ex_trg:          EX_TRG_TIOB     - Set external trigger to TIOB              */
00076 /*                  EX_TRG_TIOA     - Set external trigger to TIOA              */
00077 /* rc_comp_trg:     RC_COMP_NONE    - RC compare has no effect                  */
00078 /*                  RC_COMP_TRG     - Trigger on RC compare                     */ 
00079 
00080 uint8_t timer_capture_trigger_config (uint8_t channel, uint8_t ex_trg_edge, uint8_t ex_trg, uint8_t rc_comp_trg);
00081 
00082 
00083 
00084 /*       Timer channel register loading configuration (in capture mode only)        */
00085 /*                                                                                  */
00086 /*                          --------OPTIONS--------                                 */
00087 /* ldra:        LDRA_TIOA_NONE      - never load RA                                 */
00088 /*              LDRA_TIOA_RISING    - load RA on TIOA signal rising edge            */
00089 /*              LDRA_TIOA_FALLING   - load RA on TIOA signal falling edge           */
00090 /*              LDRA_TIOA_EACH      - load RA on TIOA rising and falling edges      */
00091 /* ldrb:        LDRB_TIOA_NONE      - never load RB                                 */
00092 /*              LDRB_TIOA_RISING    - load RB on TIOA signal rising edge            */
00093 /*              LDRB_TIOA_FALLING   - load RB on TIOA signal falling edge           */
00094 /*              LDRB_TIOA_EACH      - load RB on TIOA rising and falling edges      */
00095 /* ldrb_clk:    LDRB_CLK_STOP       - stop the clock when RB is loaded              */
00096 /*              LDRB_CLK_DIS        - disable the clock when RB is loaded           */
00097 /*              LDRB_CLK_STOP_DIS   - stop and disable the clock when RB is loaded  */
00098 /*              LDRB_CLK_NONE       - clock continues as normal on RB loading       */ 
00099 
00100 /* RA is loaded only if it has not been loaded since the last trigger or if RB has been loaded since    */
00101 /* the last loading of RA.                                                                              */
00102 /* RB is loaded only if RA has been loaded since the last trigger or the last loading of RB.            */
00103 /* Loading RA or RB before the read of the last value loaded sets the Overrun Error Flag (LOVRS)        */
00104 /* in TC_SR (Status Register). In this case, the old value is overwritten.                              */
00105 
00106 
00107 uint8_t timer_capture_register_load_config (uint8_t channel, uint8_t ldra, uint8_t ldrb, uint8_t ldrb_clk);
00108 
00109 
00110 /* Enables the timer clock */
00111 uint8_t
00112 timer_clock_enable (uint8_t channel);
00113 
00114 
00115 /*                Timer channel register reading                */
00116 /*                                                              */
00117 /*                  --------OPTIONS--------                     */
00118 /* timer_register:  TIMER_TC_CV       - Current counter value   */
00119 /*                  TIMER_TC_RA       - Current RA value        */ 
00120 /*                  TIMER_TC_RB       - Current RB value        */
00121 /*                  TIMER_TC_RC       - Current RC value        */
00122 
00123 uint16_t
00124 timer_read (uint8_t channel, uint8_t timer_reg);
00125 
00126 /* Performs a software trigger */
00127 uint8_t
00128 timer_reset (uint8_t channel);
00129 
00130 
00131 /* Disables the timer */
00132 uint8_t
00133 timer_disable (uint8_t channel);
